nodes.text: Verlen were a type of predator. They were native to the planet Dalicron-4.

In 3 ABY, the child Zanner and his pet nerf calf got lost in the woods on Dalicron-4 during a storm. A group of verlen caught the scent of the calf and attacked the creature. A bolt of lightning then brought a tree down on Zanner, stopping the verlen from being able to reach him and devour him as well. The verlen waited by the tree and were attacked by a group of Alliance to Restore the Republic agents who came to rescue Zanner.
